title: Permanent Ban
body: I loaned my account to a person who raised accounts to gold but did not pay him because I did not reach the time and he started to insult and annoy the others all for not canceling the debt is my fault I know but I wish they could give me a solution I invested a lot of money to this account, I am not a bad player but it is my fault when I entrust my account to another person, some administrator could help me answer this is not fair please

replies.body: This is one of the reasons that account sharing is unsupported and a generally bad idea.  :(  It's your account, and you want to do your best to keep it safe.  I'm not sure we'll be able to help here, but hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our PB team can check into this with you directly.

If you'd read the Terms of Service, you'd know that utilizing services such as boosting or ranked play services is not acceptable. Account sharing is punishable by a permanent ban.

Don't try and cheat the system next time.

that I must do now I am willing to assume a penalty, but that was not permanent ban. I understood and understood that I should not pay for an increase in the account, I will not make the same mistake again.
